alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Charlotte (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 2:44PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Charlotte and Campbell Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow...sleet...or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your favorite source of weather information for the latest updates. Additional details can be found at www.weather.gov/blacksburg.
